attributes.action: make car insurance companies treat men, women and car modifiers equally
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the undersigned want fairness for all when it comes to insurance i am 21 drove for a year and it costs me 2200 a year for a 1.2 my 17 year old sis with no license and no experience got qouted 1250 for a 1.6. How is this fair and if we want to spend money to make our cars look better why should we have to pay more when we are going to want to keep our car nice. Sort it out insurers its ridiculous.
